Detailed Description

This class is an interface that can be implemented by tasks that want to run in the main loop.

It is designed for large tasks, and so it is required that each task have a unique name. Tasks can be ordered by using groups (the task name is like a path) and by naming other tasks that must occur before or after the task considered.
